byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and EVELYN M. RUSLI

abstract: Microsoft and Google are considering lending financial support to private equity firms or others mulling a bid for Yahoo, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Microsoft and Google are considering lending financial support to private equity firms or others mulling a bid for Yahoo, according to people briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: As a host of potential bidders circle Yahoo, several of Silicon Valley's biggest companies are considering whether to jump into the fray themselves.

headline.main: Tech Giants Sizing Up Yahoo Bid
